title: oc-2021  -  when sharing folder, create permission only becomes available after sharing and reloading page
body:
from http://bugs.owncloud.org/thebuggenie/owncloud/issues/oc-2021

am able to confirm with v4.5.4. you don't have to share to get the 'create' option, just reloading the page once after creating the directory makes the option appear. independent of database.

description:
when i share a folder, and expand the share options, there is 'update', 'delete' and 'share'. when i share the folder and reload the page, another option becomes available: 'create'. shouldn't this option be available from the start?

version: owncoud 4.5.0, mys ql. new installation.

reproduction steps:

    create folder
    share it
    expand share options -> no 'create'.
    reload page
    check share options again: 'create' is there.

#2 comment posted by mtgap oct 28, 22:43
i can't reproduce with 4.5.1, could you try again with the latest version?

#3 comment posted by halfgaar nov 01, 15:01
i just confirmed it with version 4.5.1.

however, i noticed before, when i still had 4.5.0, that sometimes the create permission checkbox is visible right away. i haven't been able to discern what the difference in steps are that makes it work or not.
